name: proxy
description: A Bun reverse proxy server with Let's Encrypt certificate generation and process management

scripts.create-dummy-configs:
cp config/samples/basic-proxy.yaml config/proxy.yaml && printf 'processes:
  cat-demo:
    name: Cat Demo Process
    description: Long-running process that reads from stdin (cat command)
    command: cat
    enabled: true
    restartOnExit: true
    restartDelay: 5000
    maxRestarts: 3

  echo-scheduled:
    name: Echo Scheduled Task
    description: Periodically runs echo command every minute
    command: echo
    args:
      - "Hello from scheduled task at $(date)"
    enabled: true
    restartOnExit: false
    schedule:
      enabled: true
      cron: "*/1 * * * *"
      timezone: "America/New_York"
      maxDuration: 5000
      autoStop: true
      skipIfRunning: true
' > config/processes.yaml && printf 'management:
  port: 4000
  host: 0.0.0.0
  adminPassword: admin123

config:
  proxy: config/proxy.yaml
  processes: config/processes.yaml

settings:
  dataDir: data
  logsDir: logs
  certificatesDir: certificates
  tempDir: temp
  statsDir: data/statistics
  cacheDir: data/cache
  statistics:
    enabled: true
  networkMonitoring:
    enabled: true
    interval: 30000
    endpoint: 1.1.1.1
' > config/main.yaml && echo 'Dummy config files created in config/ directory'
